item.title: Staffzone Command and Welcome message Please Help!@!
item.dc:creator: @rhys132 rhys132
item.description:
@rhys132 wrote:

lol you dont put the people name, you put their rights, so in mod commands put it there and also in admin.

public void administratorCommands(Client c, String playerCommand)
{

under that you would put

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“staffzone”)) {
c.getPA().spellTeleport(X Cords*, Y Cords, Height);
c.sendMessage(“Message”);
}
and then also put it in admin and if you got owner, put it in there aswell?

Read full topic

[size=1]if (playerCommand.equals(“nexuszone”)) { && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Dave”) || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Zooplet”) || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Mattsworld”)
c.getPA().movePlayer(2961, 3028, 0);
}[/size][/quote]

nope nexus van fl studio :p??

if (playerCommand.equals("nexuszone")) && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Dave") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Zooplet") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mattsworld"){ c.getPA().movePlayer(2961, 3028, 0); }

dit volgens mij

Copy this after the (staffzone)

dan gebruik dit && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("justfear") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("fernando") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mitch") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("bannana")))

item.title: Staffzone Command and Welcome message Please Help!@!
item.dc:creator: @Impactz Impactz
item.description:
@Impactz wrote:

I wanted to make a command that tele’s you to 2961 3028

if(playerCommand.startsWith(“staffzone”)) {
try {
teleportToX = 2961;
teleportToY = 3028;
}
}

But it didn’t work, what do i need do?

Second question, where can i change the welcome message ?

(Sorry for the bad english, im from the netherlands. I am using hybrid-pvp v3 source btw.)

Read full topic
